short.ja: クローム拡張機能として楽しいゲーム「Learn To Fly」をプレイしましょう。また、オフラインでもプレイすることができます。今すぐ試してみてください！
short.ko: 크롬 확장 프로그램인 "Learn To Fly - Fun Game"을 플레이하세요. 또한 인터넷 없이도 플레이할 수 있습니다. 지금 바로 시도해보세요!
short.lt: Žaiskite mokytis skraidyti - smagi žaidimo priedą „Chrome“ naršyklėje - Taip pat galite žaisti be interneto, išbandykite dabar!
short.lv: Spēlējiet "Iemācies lido" - jautru spēli kā Google Chrome paplašinājumu - Varat arī spēlēt bez interneta, izmēģiniet to tagad!
short.ms: Mainkan Learn To Fly - Permainan Seru sebagai ekstensi Chrome - Juga dapat dimainkan tanpa internet, coba sekarang!

short.th: เล่น Learn To Fly - เกมสนุกเป็นปลั๊กอินของ Chrome - สามารถเล่นได้โดยไม่ต้องเชื่อมต่ออินเทอร์เน็ตเลย ลองเล่นเดี๋ยวนี้!

short.vi: Chơi Learn To Fly - Trò chơi vui nhộn dưới dạng tiện ích Chrome - Cũng có thể chơi mà không cần Internet, hãy thử ngay bây giờ!
short.zh_CN: 作为Chrome扩展的《学会飞行》-有趣的游戏-还可以在没有网络的情况下玩，立即试玩！
short.zh_TW: 玩《學習飛行－有趣遊戲》作為Google Chrome擴展 - 也可以離線遊玩，立即嘗試！

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
"Learn To Fly" is an immersive online flash game that seamlessly blends elements of distance challenges and flight simulation. Dive into the adventure as you aid a determined penguin in overcoming the trials of flightlessness. This Antarctic escapade follows the penguin's quest for flight, utilizing an array of gadgets and gliders to launch off a ramp, aiming to soar to unprecedented heights and distances. The game is celebrated for its endearing narrative, gradual progression, and the sheer delight of helping a penguin fulfill its dream of taking flight.

How to Take Flight:
In "Learn To Fly" your objective is to guide the penguin to fly as far as possible by employing various gadgets and upgrades. Take command of the penguin's angle of descent, utilizing boosts to prolong its flight. Success involves maintaining the penguin's balance in the air to achieve optimal distance while strategically managing resources to acquire upgrades for enhanced flight capabilities.

Game Maneuvers:
🔽🔽 Left/Right Arrow Keys or A/D Keys: Adjust the penguin's flight angle.
🚀 Space Bar: Activate boosters (once unlocked).

Embark on this thrilling journey, master the art of flight, and witness the penguin's triumphant soar in "Master the Skies"! 🐧✈️

Explore more exciting games and diverse themes through the top-left menu.
